name: Welcome to the Gallows
description:
The Gallows Crow - Welcome to the Gallows...
Unfortunately the game we worked on was lost last minute to hard drive failure. We still had the music we composed for the game. This is just a simple story behind what we were wanting to create. The game originally would of been an RPG. Either way, we hope you enjoy the story. 
***WARNING***
The story does contain violence and gore but only in text. 
And TYPOS!!! We didn't feel right changing art assets as they are not so much a "bug". Please forgive us. 
BUG FIXES POST SUBMISSION:
The Z index on some of the story blocks were scrolling BEHIND the background :-( so I went in and re-ordered them. That's the only change.
MUSIC:
We hope you enjoy our original music that we recorded. It is designed to be background for the game, but ended up being the center piece for it :-)

WE WILL BE UPDATING TO THE RPF POST JAM SO CHECK BACK!!

SPOTIFY:
Our Spotify Page - check out our original music on spotify
Our YouTube Channel - our YouTube channel (more coming soon)

NOVEMBER 27th 2021 @ Oreilly's Dallas
If you happen to be in the DFW area, come out to Oreilly's Sports Bar on Nov. 27 @ 8:30 to hear us play live. We'd love to meet y'all. We will be sharing the stage with Syndey Harte and Mother Freud that night.

HAPPY HAUNTING!!
